hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.intro: I'm a passionate Full Stack developer with experience in modern web technologies and software development. I develop user-centric solutions using React, Java, and Spring Boot.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I focus on continuous learning and development in my software development journey. I have gained experience in both frontend and backend technologies in Full Stack development.
about.paragraph2: I specialize in modern web technologies and software development tools. I develop scalable and user-friendly applications using React and Spring Boot.
about.paragraph3: I am committed to writing clean code, agile methodologies, and continuous learning. I am eager to learn and apply new technologies to succeed in challenging projects.

nextarpInternship.title: Full Stack Intern
description: Contributing to web application development using React and Spring Boot
Working on database design and API integration
Gaining team collaboration experience with agile development methodologies

t3VakfiTeaching.title: Software Instructor
description: Instructing students in basic programming concepts
Organizing practical projects and hands-on training

goktasAgvTeknofest.title: Team Captain and Developer
description: Developing autonomous vehicle software for Teknofest competitions
Taking on team leadership and project management responsibilities
Working on software architecture and system design

trainingRoster.title: Training Roster
trainingRoster.description: A sports management system we developed that manages training programs and athlete tracking. Built with React, Spring Boot, and MySQL.

goktasAgv.title: Göktaş AGV
goktasAgv.description: An autonomous vehicle project developed for Teknofest competitions. Developed user interface with React and control systems with C++.

hrManagementSystem.title: HR Management System
hrManagementSystem.description: A comprehensive system developed for human resources management. Includes modules for employee information, leave tracking, and payroll management.

mailto.title: Let's Connect
mailto.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas or opportunities to be part of your vision. Feel free to reach out to me directly via email.
